Top_Header: Empower Your Business with World Class Software Development Services
Top_Description: We offer a multitude of services from custom software development to ongoing support to help drive your business’ digital transformation. We source experts with substantial experience and expertise across industries to help streamline your operations, optimise expenses, and boost efficiency all while helping you innovate your core functions.
Header_TrustedPartnerInCorporateSoftware: Trusted Partner in Corporate Software Development
D1_OurSoftwareDevelopmentServices: Transform your business with custom enterprise software solutions built for scalability and efficiency. Our team designs, develops, and deploys robust applications tailored to your unique needs. We focus on delivering secure, high-performance systems that streamline operations and drive business growth.
D2_OurSoftwareDevelopmentServices: Ensure flawless software with our comprehensive QA services. Our expert testers rigorously assess functionality, performance, and security to guarantee a bug-free, seamless user experience. With automated and manual testing, we ensure your product meets the highest quality standards before launch.
D3_OurSoftwareDevelopmentServices: Streamline your development and operations with our DevOps expertise. We automate workflows, improve collaboration, and ensure faster, reliable deployments. Our end-to-end DevOps solutions enhance efficiency, reduce downtime, and optimize your software delivery pipeline for maximum performance.
D4_OurSoftwareDevelopmentServices: Boost your online visibility with our expert SEO services. We craft intelligent, data-driven strategies dedicated to optimise your site for higher rankings, better traffic, and improved user experience. We aim to deliver measurable results that grow your business and keep you ahead in search engine rankings.
D5_OurSoftwareDevelopmentServices: Scale your team effortlessly with our managed staff augmentation services. We provide skilled professionals tailored to your project needs, allowing you to quickly fill talent gaps and accelerate development. Our experts seamlessly integrate into your team, delivering quality results without overhead.
D6_OurSoftwareDevelopmentServices: Elevate your business with custom AI solutions that automate tasks, enhance decision-making, and boost efficiency. Our expert team ensures precision and seamless integration with rigorously tested AI models. Experience the future of technology with scalable AI systems designed for real-world impact.
Header_EntrustYourCorporateSoftwareDevel: Entrust Your Corporate Software Development Needs to Us
T1_EntrustYourCorporateSoftwareDevelopme: Access the Best Talent in the Industry
D1_EntrustYourCorporateSoftwareDevelopme: Our talent pool goes through the multi-step vetting process where both technical and interpersonal skills are assessed equally. Our efficient onboarding process includes a 3-step interview process and usually concludes within 2 to 3 weeks.
D2_EntrustYourCorporateSoftwareDevelopme: Our comprehensive HR solutions include payroll processing, performance evaluation, and employee development programs. We will take the burden off your shoulders, allowing you to focus on your core business.
D3_EntrustYourCorporateSoftwareDevelopme: At Swivel Tech, we leverage agile frameworks like Scrum and Kanban to deliver projects efficiently and effectively. Our experienced team of developers and project managers will work closely with you to ensure a successful agile implementation.
D4_EntrustYourCorporateSoftwareDevelopme: Outsourcing your IT needs to Swivel Tech can help you reallocate your resources to core business activities and achieve significant cost savings without compromising the quality of your IT services.
Header_WeAreProficientInYourTechStack: We Are Proficient in Your Tech Stack
PersonName1_Description: Swivel’s development solution solved a big problem for us. With their facilitated process and access to high-quality engineering talent, we now have the confidence to scale for our projects more reliably, giving us more certainty to start and deliver for our clients on time.
PersonName2_Description: The tech lead assigned to our project has been extremely capable and knowledgeable, providing valuable input into areas outside his remit. The folks at Swivel have been friendly, responsive, and very helpful - great customer servicing. All matters have been handled courteously and professionally. Will happily make Swivel my first choice for all future offshore needs.
PersonName3_Description: The team that worked for us was very technically proficient. Swivel has very good relationship management and is constantly in contact and available for escalation. The Swivel team delivered a lot of quality products for us, worked well with our onshore teams, and met delivery deadline expectations. Yes. I have worked with many outsourcing companies in my career and Swivel is perfect for an SME like myDNA.
